survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Coffee Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who use subscription-based coffee services to understand their satisfaction levels, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based coffee service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to capture tenure. Ensure mobile-friendly dropdown if needed.

script.question_text: How long have you been using a subscription-based coffee service?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features are most important to you in a coffee subscription service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of top preferences.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with max 3 selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following features are most important to you in a coffee subscription service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of coffee provided by your subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of coffee provided by your subscription service?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your coffee subscription experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your coffee subscription experience?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your coffee subscription service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your coffee subscription service to a friend or colleague?
